description.p: Updates the Ajax Callback URL for a PhoneGap application.

argument.name: url
argument.description: The new Ajax Callback URL. Must be a fully qualified URL. For example, "https://www.myserver.com/v2".

return.name: newAjaxURL
return.description: Returns the full Ajax URL for the component.

discussion.p: When you build a PhoneGap application, the URL for AJAX callbacks is set at the time that you build the application.

You can change this URL at runtime using the *[js:{dialog.object}._updateAjaxURL()]* method. The *[js:_updateAjaxURL()]* method handles updating the *[ui:{dialog.object}.ajaxURL]* property. For example:

description.p: This method is preferred to setting the *[ui:{dialog.object}.ajaxURL]* property directly because it does not require that you also specify the published component's filename in the URL.
